items.title: Heidi Putkuri
items.text:

items.title: Education

• Bachelor of Science in Engineering | Data engineering and AI | 2024- | projects

items.title: Bioinformatician
items.text:
Finnish Institute for Health and Welfare | July 2025 - Present

  • Automated sequencing data analysis workflows, reducing manual processing time, by developing Python-based pipeline orchestration for viral sequencing data.
  • Part of LIMS database migration affecting thousands of records and hundreds of users, ensuring zero data loss by implementing robust validation checks and migration scripts in Oracle SQL

Tools: Python 路 Git 路 Nextflow 路 Oracle SQL 路 Pipeline automation

items.title: Master's Thesis Researcher
items.text:
University of Helsinki | June 2024 - October 2024

Thesis: Classifying Bacterial Species Using Methylation Patterns in Complex Microbial Communities

  • Achieved 94% classification accuracy in bacterial species identification from wastewater samples, by developing a Random Forest model trained on position weight matrix representations of NGS methylation data
  • Contributed to peer-reviewed publication (published 2025) in collaboration with Melina Markkanen, by transforming raw methylation data into machine learning-ready formats and implementing the classification pipeline
  • Processed more than 20 Gbs of sequencing data, creating reproducible analysis workflow documented in version-controlled Python codebase

Tools: Python 路 Scikit-learn 路 Pandas 路 Git 路 NGS data analysis

items.title: Research Assistant
items.text:
Folkh盲lsan Research Institute - Eye Genetics Group | January 2023 - December 2024

  • Accelerated variant calling workflows processing long-read sequencing data from hundreds of patients, by implementing parallelized pipelines using CSC's Puhti supercomputer and SLURM batch processing
  • Reduced data processing errors by developing automated, reproducible analysis pipelines with built-in quality control steps
  • Managed tens of TBs of sequencing data across CSC Allas cloud storage, implementing efficient data lifecycle management and backup strategies
  • Enabled cross-functional research with doctors and biologists, by translating complex bioinformatics results into actionable insights through clear documentation and visualization

Tools: Linux 路 Python 路 SLURM 路 CSC Puhti 路 Bash 路 Git 路 Cloud storage (AWS in CSC Allas) 路 Sequence alignment 路 Variant calling

items.title: Software Testing Intern
items.text:
FISION OY | September 2021 - February 2022

  • Improved GUI quality by identifying and documenting bugs/issues across testing cycles, contributing to more stable product releases
  • Created comprehensive test documentation covering features, enabling faster onboarding of new QA team members
  • Gained exposure to full software development lifecycle, observing agile development practices and bug triage processes

Tools: GUI testing 路 documentation 路 Software QA
